page.description: Fires when the user clicks the 'Logout' hyperlink to log out of the application.

discussion.p: The *[ui:onLogout]* server-side event fires when the user tries to logout. This event can be used to clear session variables or record the logout action as desired.

argument.name: e
argument.description: A dot variable that contains information about the Tabbed UI component. *[xb:e]* has the following properties:

property.name: logoutSucceeded
property.description: Either .t. or .f. depending on whether the user was successfully logged out or not.

property.name: tmpl
property.description: The component definition for the Tabbed UI.
